channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pot hole, 8th December
item.description:
Pot hole has been there over 3 months

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Draper Close, Lessness Heath, Greater London

item.title: Poo bin needs emptying, 8th December
item.description:
The dog poo bin opposite St Marys Church on Shoulder of Mutton Green (near cul de sac end of Camborne Road) is overflowing and needs emptying ASAP.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bellegrove Close, Falconwood, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lights out from 2 lamp posts, 8th December
item.description:
The area is very dark and feels very unsafe to go to the station. 2 lamp posts lights are out. Starbucks provides no lights even with lamp posts present. Children pass by to and from school.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Clydesdale Way, Lower Belvedere, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Burton Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Fly-tip Large - More than a van load

item.title: Street lights not working, 8th December
item.description:
Street lights on even numbers side on Green Lane SE9 from Fiveways junction of A20 to just past Broad Lawn not working for almost a week now. Unsafe for pedestrians and a security risk for the houses

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Green Lane, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Van blocking pavement every day, 8th December
item.description:
This vehicle fully blocks the pedestrian right of way on the pavement of Crimscott Street. It has been parked here every day for at least 3 months.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 36, Crimscott Street, Old Kent Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: We have a crossing outside the shop and when cars go buy when it has rained haeavy the big pool of water splashes againet the windo and will damage my window one day if a big stone hits it, 8th December
item.description:
This has been here for the last 2 years and the council are not doing anything about it. Lots of people get splattered with the rain whilst waiting at the traffic light crossing outside my shop

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 280, Battersea Park Road, Battersea, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: More bikes all over pavement, 8th December

item.title: Illegal occupation of resident parking bay, 8th December
item.description:
